T02D1845:161b-1: shr'i gu hya sa m'a dza tantra bi ba ra nam /
T02D1845:161b-3: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa /
T02D1845:161b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1845:161b-5: gang 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs //
T02D1845:161b-6: shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid bstan //
T02D1845:161b-7: de yi bdag gyur dmigs med pa //
T02D1845:161b-9: blo dman gyur kyang dad tsam gyis //
T02D1845:161b-10: yang dag bskul nas 'gro ba rnams //
T02D1845:161b-11: dam pa'i lam la 'jug gyur pa //
T02D1845:161b-13: de dag ye shes zhal snga yi //
T02D1845:161b-14: man ngag rang nyid kyis dran phyir //
T02D1845:161b-15: blo gros blun yang 'dus pa'i don //
T02D1845:161b-16: 'dir ni ci nus bri bar bya //
T02D1845:161b-17: rtogs dka' ba dang don che ba'i //
T02D1845:161b-18: tshig nyung 'ga' tsam cung zad cig / rnam par dbye ba de las ni //
T02D1845:161b-19: lhag ma go sla rang nyid go //
T02D1845:161b-20: gang yang lhag dang chad ba'am //
T02D1845:161b-21: nyes smras 'di na ci snang de //
T02D1845:161b-22: bshad mdzad gzhung ni ma rtogs pas //
T02D1845:161b-23: bdag blo nyid kyis nyes pa yin //
T02D1845:161b-24: des na mkhas pas bla ma yi //
T02D1845:161b-25: skyon yin par ni mi brtag ste //
T02D1845:161b-26: slob ma blo dman nyes pa yis //
T02D1845:161b-27: rtogs pa'i bshad mdzad smad mi bya //
T02D1845:161b-28: 'di skad ces bya ba ni 'og nas bshad pa'i
T02D1845:161b-29: rgyud kyi don ma lus pa blo la rnam par
T02D1845:161b-30: gnas bzhin pa bsdus pa la ltos pa yin no
T02D1845:161b-31: // bdag gis zhes bya ba ni sdud par byed
T02D1845:161b-32: pa bdag nyid 'od dpag tu med pa mngon par
T02D1845:161b-33: rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid kyis gcig tu brgyud
T02D1845:161b-34: de thos pa la sbyor ba ma yin pa dang
T02D1845:161b-35: // / gtam 'di ni bdag gis dngos su thos pa yin gyi /
T02D1845:161b-36: bdag nyid kyis ni ma yin no zhes nges par bzung ba ste /
T02D1845:161b-37: brjod kyis mi lang ba zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1845:161b-38: pa 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshig dang 'gal ba nyid
T02D1845:161b-39: du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1845:161b-40: thos pa zhes bya ba ni sgra so sor snang ba'i bdag nyid kyi rgyud rtogs pa'o //
T02D1845:161b-42: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid kyis rdo
T02D1845:161b-43: rje 'chang ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na rdo
T02D1845:161b-44: rje chos kyi mnyan la sogs pa 'gal lo zhe
T02D1845:162a-0: bcom ldan 'das ni sems can gyi khams dang bsam pa sna tshogs pa rnams @162a * //
T02D1845:162a-1: gdul ba'i thabs kyi dbang gis gcig pu nyid kyang
T02D1845:162a-2: dpag tu med pa'i tshul gyis 'jug par mdzad de
T02D1845:162a-3: / bltams pa dang mngon par byung ba dang /
T02D1845:162a-4: dka' ba spyod par mdzad pa dang /
T02D1845:162a-5: mngon par byang chub pa dang /
T02D1845:162a-6: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
T02D1845:162a-8: mos pa sna tshogs bsam pa tha dad pa'i //
T02D1845:162a-9: sems can dbang gis khyad par mang po 'khrungs //
T02D1845:162a-10: gcig pu'ang chu yi snod ni du ma ru //
T02D1845:162a-11: zla ba'i gzugs brnyan 'char ba dag dang mtshungs //
T02D1845:162a-13: dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni dus gcig gi
T02D1845:162a-14: tshe kho na thos so zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1845:162a-17: gzhan du ni gzhan dag go zhes mang du thos
T02D1845:162a-18: pa nyid du ston pas tshig mchog tu gzung bar
T02D1845:162a-19: bya ba nyid yin no zhes bshad par bya'o //
T02D1845:162a-20: byang chub la brten pa'i rdo rje chos ni 'das
T02D1845:162a-21: pa la sogs pa da ltar gyi ngo bor dgongs
T02D1845:162a-22: shing / thams cad lan gcig yang dag par rig pa yin te /
T02D1845:162a-23: des na thos pa mang bar grub pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D1845:162a-24: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan drug ste /
T02D1845:162a-25: 'dir ni me long lta bu dang /
T02D1845:162a-26: mnyam pa nyid la sogs pa'i rang bzhin la skal
T02D1845:162a-27: ba zhes bshad de de gang la mnga' ba de
T02D1845:162a-29: yang na bcom pas bcom ldan 'das zhes bshad de //
T02D1845:162a-30: nyon mongs pa'i bdud la sogs pa bcom pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1845:162a-32: nyon mongs shes rab la rag las //
T02D1845:162a-33: de bas shes rab bcom par bshad //
T02D1845:162a-34: ces gsungs pa'i phyir phung po dang /
T02D1845:162a-38: bzhi po 'joms pa'i shes rab kyi ngo bo la bcom pa zhes bshad la /
T02D1845:162a-39: de gang la mnga' ba de ni bcom ldan 'das te /
T02D1845:162a-40: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'o //
T02D1845:162a-41: de bzhin gshags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1845:162a-42: ni bla na med pa'i chos ston pa dang rjes

T02D1845:162a-44: te / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku

T02D1845:162a-46: yul ma yin pas na gsang ba'o //
T02D1845:162b-0: de nyid ni rdo rje @162b ste mi phyed pa dang 'tshe ba med pa dang /
T02D1845:162b-1: yang dag pa'i don gyi ngo bo nyid ni snying
T02D1845:162b-2: po ste de rnams kyi tha mi dad pa'i ngo
T02D1845:162b-3: bo nyid do // de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid

T02D1845:162b-12: chags la sogs pa mngon par byang chub pa'i ngo
T02D1845:162b-13: bo nyid du mdzad pas na 'di nyid ni de

T02D1845:162b-15: sngon byung ba gtso bor mdzad pa ni ma yin /

T02D1845:162b-17: ba nyid kyis de yang dag par rig pa yin
T02D1845:162b-19: gcig nas gcig tu mngon sum du //
T02D1845:162b-20: rgyu ni 'bras bu nyid gyur pa'i //
T02D1845:162b-21: da ltar byung ba'i gzugs gang yin //
T02D1845:162b-22: de ni rnal 'byor pa yin shes //
T02D1845:162b-24: brjod kyis mi lang ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'khor bstan pa yin te /

T02D1845:162b-27: ba ste / de nyid kyis na sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1845:162b-28: zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin
T02D1845:162b-29: ba ste / no // byang chub ni rnam pa
T02D1845:162b-30: thams cad mkhyen pa'i mngon par byang chub pa ste
T02D1845:162b-31: ba ste / no // / der ni nyid la
T02D1845:162b-32: sems dpa' gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems
T02D1845:162b-33: ba ste / no // / dpa'o // sems can
T02D1845:162b-34: gyi tshogs chen po'i don la zhugs pas na sems
T02D1845:162b-36: de rnams dang lhan cig bdag gis thos so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1845:162b-37: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni
T02D1845:162b-38: de rnams kyi nang nas mngon par rtogs pa dang
T02D1845:162b-39: rjes su mthun pa cung zad cig ston te /
T02D1845:162b-40: de las kyang mi g-yo ba dang /
T02D1845:162b-42: byams pa la sogs pa ni dkyil 'khor ba nyid du bkag pa yin no //
T02D1845:162b-43: dris pa rgyud 'dir so sor nges pa nyid du bstan na /
T02D1845:162b-44: sems dpa' de rnams ji ltar brjod kyis mi lang ba yin /
T02D1845:162b-46: de rnams re re nyid rang rang dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi bdag por gyur pas /
T02D1845:163a-0: gtso bo nyid yin pas na grangs @163a * //
T02D1845:163a-1: nges pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba dgongs so //

T02D1845:163a-5: pa de ni dam tshig rdo rje ste /

T02D1845:163a-7: chos kyi brda'i dbang gis na dam tshig ste rdo
T02D1845:163a-8: rje'i sgras ni sa'i snying po lta bu nyid ting
T02D1845:163a-10: de bzhin du sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i sgras

T02D1845:163a-13: / sgra de dag brdar btags pa yin pa'i phyir phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02D1845:163a-16: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
T02D1845:163a-17: kun du bzang po rim pa ci lta ba bzhin du bshad pa yin no //

T02D1845:163a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas ye shes

T02D1845:163a-24: tshig gdon mi za bar 'grub pa la sogs pa
T02D1845:163a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byang chub sems dpa'i sde
T02D1845:163a-26: tshogs su tshig gi sbyor bas de'i rigs kyi bdag
T02D1845:163a-27: po rnams kyi nye bar gdags par sgrib pa rnam
T02D1845:163a-28: par sel ba la sogs pa bstan to zhes bshad
T02D1845:163a-29: mod kyi de rnams kyi dka' bar 'byin pa 'dis
T02D1845:163a-30: kun du bzang po la sogs pa'i rim pa las

T02D1845:163a-40: brtag pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa yin pa'i phyir te /
T02D1845:163a-41: 'di ni 'og nas rigs kyi nges pa ston bzhin
T02D1845:163a-42: pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs
T02D1845:163a-43: so // sa'i snying po la sogs pa 'di dag
T02D1845:163a-44: kyang nang gi skye mched rnam par dag pa'i ngo
T02D1845:163a-46: de byin gyis brlab pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa la dgos pa yin gyi /
T02D1845:163b-0: dkyil 'khor pa nyid kyis ni ma yin te @163b rgyud las rang gi mtshan ma dang /
T02D1845:163b-1: ting nge 'dzin gyi rang gi ngo bo gdon pa bstan pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1845:163b-2: sa rdo rje dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhi'i sgras ni sa dang /
T02D1845:163b-4: thabs la sogs pa rnam par dag pa spyan dang /
T02D1845:163b-8: lha mo bzhi rim bzhin du gsungs pa yin no //

T02D1845:163b-10: 'byung bar khang pa brtsegs ma la sogs pa rten
T02D1845:163b-11: dang brten pa'i gzugs can nam mkha'i rnam par dag
T02D1845:163b-12: pa'i don bstan pa yin no //
T02D1845:163b-13: nam mkha' ni rdo rje ste /
T02D1845:163b-14: dmigs su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid
T02D1845:163b-15: kyis rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1845:163b-16: // 'di rdo rje 'dzin pa yin par ni mi 'dod de /
T02D1845:163b-17: bzhugs zhes bya ba rdo rje sems dpa' nyid yin par bshad pa'i phyir ro //

T02D1845:163b-23: bshad pa der yang nang gi nam mkha'i ngo bo
T02D1845:163b-24: nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin pas de skad bshad do

T02D1845:163b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa 'dzin par byed
T02D1845:163b-28: pas na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o zhes bshad par bya'o
T02D1845:163b-29: // gzugs rdo rje dang zhes bya ba la sogs

T02D1845:164b-15: sogs pa yang rang rang gi rigs dang rjes su
T02D1845:164b-16: mthun par m'a ma k'i la sogs pa lta bur
T02D1845:164b-17: ci rigs par byung nas zhugs so zhes mthun par
T02D1845:164b-18: shes par bya'o // yang gdon mi za bar grub pa ni la la sgrol ma lta bu ste /
T02D1845:164b-19: sku mdog ser po dang ldan pa dang la la
T02D1845:164b-20: ni reg gi ngo bo lta bu ste nyid kyi
T02D1845:164b-21: sku mdog lta gu dang ldan par phyung nas zhugs
T02D1845:164b-22: so zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
T02D1845:164b-23: sku mdog gnyis kyis phyung ba'i dgos pa ni bsam
T02D1845:164b-24: pa sna tshogs pa'i sems can gyi khams gdul ba'i
T02D1845:164b-25: phyir yin te / ji ltar aindra n'i la ltar
T02D1845:164b-26: snang ba ni mi bskyod pa'i mngon par byang chub
T02D1845:164b-28: rgyud gzhan dag las ni sa gnon gyi phyag rgya
T02D1845:164b-29: dang ldan pa sku mdog ser po zhes bshad la
T02D1845:164b-30: / 'dir yang reg bya las skyes pa nyid bde ba chen po gtso bo ste /
T02D1845:164b-31: mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu yin no zhes ston pa'i phyir reg bya yin no //
T02D1845:164b-32: lha mo dgu'i mthar thug par bshad kyi chos kyi
T02D1845:164b-33: dbyings rdo rje ma gsungs pa ni gzugs kyi phung
T02D1845:164b-34: po dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes la
T02D1845:164b-35: sogs pa rnam par dag pa rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1845:164b-36: la sogs pa de dag nyid yin pa'am /
T02D1845:164b-37: sa'i khams kyi gzugs la sogs pa rnam par dag
T02D1845:164b-38: pa'i spyin gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis
T02D1845:164b-39: 'byin pa dang / 'jug pa dag las shes par bya ste /
T02D1845:164b-40: bcom ldan 'das ni dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1845:165a-0: dper na rtsa ba'i rgyud ni bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa me @165a * //
T02D1845:165a-1: long lta bu'i ye shes rnam par dag pa yin
T02D1845:165a-2: la 'dir ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnam
T02D1845:165a-3: par dag pa las byung ba yin no zhes bya
T02D1845:165a-4: ba thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa
T02D1845:165a-5: yin no // ji ltar na rgyal ba rnams lha
T02D1845:165a-6: mo'i gzugs 'dzin pas phyung ngo zhes bya ba byung
T02D1845:165a-7: ba tsam gsungs na de rnams ni rang gi rigs
T02D1845:165a-8: par zhugs pa ji ltar gsungs /
T02D1845:165a-9: de ni bden mod kyi 'on kyang zhugs par gyur
T02D1845:165a-10: to zhes sngar gsungs pa de 'dir yang rjes su
T02D1845:165a-12: phyi rol la bya ba yin pas nyes pa med do //
T02D1845:165a-13: phyi rol du gnas pa'i bud med kyi gzugs kyi
T02D1845:165a-14: tshogs mchog tu bde ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba ma yin
T02D1845:165a-15: te ; lha mo'i gzugs rnams 'khyud pa'i rang gi
T02D1845:165a-16: rigs pa'i nang du zhugs par shugs kyis shes par
T02D1845:165a-17: te ; bya'o // de bas na 'di nyid ni le'u bco brgyad pa las bshad de /
T02D1845:165a-18: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul nyid kyis //
T02D1845:165a-19: ye shes 'khor lo can rnams bsdu //
T02D1845:165a-20: lha mo dgu ni spros nas su //
T02D1845:165a-21: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la dgod //
T02D1845:165a-23: sems can rnams gzhug pa'i phyir gnas rnam par dag pa bstan pa ni /
T02D1845:165a-24: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston pa yin te /
T02D1845:165a-25: btsun mo'i bha ga la zhes bya ba ni btsun
T02D1845:165a-26: mo dang yang dag par 'dus pa'i bha ga la
T02D1845:165a-27: ste / dbang phyug la sogs pa dang ldan pas
T02D1845:165a-28: gcig pu nyid yin yang mang po'i tshig tu gsungs
T02D1845:165a-29: ste / pa yin no // dam tshig chen po'i
T02D1845:165a-30: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni rang gi khar bcug
T02D1845:165a-31: pa'i bde bar gshegs pa ma lus pa zhugs pa
T02D1845:165a-32: sngon du 'gro ba'i zla ba zhu ba'i gzugs rdo
T02D1845:165a-33: rje'i lam nas byung ba byang chub kyi sems ni
T02D1845:165a-35: de yongs su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1845:165a-36: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang bral bas rdul dang bral ba'o //
T02D1845:165a-37: sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas ma yin pa mnyam pa nyid kyis ni gru bzhi'o //
T02D1845:165a-38: dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi gzhir gyur pas na gsal ba'o //
T02D1845:165a-39: sra ba dang bar du gcod pa'i gnas med pas de'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D1845:165a-40: sangs rgyas mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pas sna tshogs gzugs so //
T02D1845:165a-41: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis rnam par spros
T02D1845:165a-42: pas na kun du sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis kun
T02D1845:165b-0: du khyab pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams @165b kyi 'od zer 'phro ba dang bsdu ba dang /
T02D1845:165b-1: gnas pa dang brtan par gyur pas kun du rtsol bas na /
T02D1845:165b-2: 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug / ces bya'o //
T02D1845:165b-3: zla ba dang nyi ma la sogs pa'i gdan dang ldan pas na /
T02D1845:165b-4: gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan //
T02D1845:165b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi ngo
T02D1845:165b-7: bo byang chub kyi sems rdo rje dang 'brel bas
T02D1845:165b-8: na de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi'o //
T02D1845:165b-9: thar pa'i gnas su gyur pas na gnas so //
T02D1845:165b-11: de ltar phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par byung ba ltar nges par snang ba dang /
T02D1845:165b-12: dang po'i rdo rje 'chang ba gnyis lhag par mos
T02D1845:165b-13: pa'i stobs kyis mtshungs par bsam gtan las byung ba'i
T02D1845:165b-16: bskyed pa'i rim pa las byung ba'i rnal 'byor pa
T02D1845:165b-17: bzhi char la yang rang gi nye bar len pa
T02D1845:165b-18: ji lta ba'i rgyur gyur pa las byung bar bsgoms
T02D1845:165b-19: pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yin pa de bzhin du las
T02D1845:165b-20: dang po'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas la
T02D1845:165b-21: mchod pa dam pa la sogs pa nas brtsams te
T02D1845:165b-22: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes
T02D1845:165b-23: par bya ba'i ngo bo'i rgyu mthun pa chen po
T02D1845:165b-24: la sogs pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1845:165b-25: / ro // rang gi rigs pa'i chos 'byung ba'i
T02D1845:165b-26: nang du chud pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus na
T02D1845:165b-27: gnas pa stong pa nyid kyi byang chub kyi rang
T02D1845:165b-29: lha'i rang gi ngo bo tsam du nges par snang
T02D1845:165b-30: ba bsam par bya ba'i 'khor lo'i nye bar len
T02D1845:165b-31: pa yin no // ye shes cung zad babs pas
T02D1845:165b-32: ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa thun
T02D1845:165b-33: mtshams rang gi sngags zlos pa ni rang gi lha'i
T02D1845:165b-34: sa bon sngar bsgoms pa brtags pa yin pa'i phyir
T02D1845:165b-35: pa yin no // ro // ye shes la dbang
T02D1845:165b-36: thob pa dag kyang nye bar len pa'i rgyu de'i
T02D1845:165b-37: stobs kyis rten dang brten par nges par snang ba
T02D1845:165b-38: la shin tu goms par bslabs pa'i dbang las byung
T02D1845:165b-39: ba'i nye bar len pa'i rgyus aom la sogs pa'i
T02D1845:165b-40: yi ge gsum gyi cha'i lhan cig byed pa'i rang
T02D1845:165b-41: gi sems las rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po
T02D1845:165b-42: thams cad kyi rdul phra rab rnams la rnam pa
T02D1845:165b-43: thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pas spro ba dang
T02D1845:165b-44: bsdu ba'i rgyur gyur pa 'khor lo bzhag la /
T02D1845:165b-45: cung zad rgyun gyi rnal 'byor la gnas pa yin te //
T02D1845:166a-1: kyi nges pa de la brtag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1845:166a-2: yang dag pa'i ye shes la dbang du gyur pa
T02D1845:166a-3: yang shin tu goms par bslabs pas lhun gyis grub
T02D1845:166a-4: par 'jug pas rdul phra rab re re zhing yang
T02D1845:166a-5: 'khor lo dam pa gsum chud cing /
T02D1845:166a-6: phan tshun du gzugs brnyan du gyur pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1845:166a-7: kyi gzugs can bdag nyid thams cad du gtogs pa
T02D1845:166a-8: / skad cig ma'i rkyen dang bral ba /
T02D1845:166a-9: dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las yang dag par byung ba /
T02D1845:166a-10: bde ba'i nga rgyal gyis rgyas par bsgom par bya zhing 'gro ba'i don bya'o //
T02D1845:166a-11: lhun gyis grub par thob cing /
T02D1845:166a-12: skad cig ma re re'i sbyor ba la gnas pa'i
T02D1845:166a-13: rtag par gyur pa yin te zhar la 'ongs pas
T02D1845:166a-14: chog go // sems can rnams gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1845:166a-15: du gzhug pa bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya
T02D1845:166a-16: ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1845:166a-17: gzhug par gyur to zhes bya ba ni sems can
T02D1845:166a-18: rnams zhes bya bar las kyi tshig tu blta bar
T02D1845:166a-19: bya ste / gsol ba gdab pa gnyis pa'i tshig gi don ni de yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1845:166a-20: da ni sems can rnams la gzhug pa tsam gyis
T02D1845:166a-21: de kho na nyid sngags kyi sbyor ba dang bcas
T02D1845:166a-22: pa dang / gsang ba dang bcas pa yi ge'i
T02D1845:166a-23: phyag rgya rnams kyis rab tu sbas pa yang smra
T02D1845:166a-24: bar rigs pa ma yin pas dbang bskur bar bya
T02D1845:166a-25: pa dang / ba'i phyir / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1845:166a-26: thugs la zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um la sogs pa las byung ba dang /
T02D1845:166a-27: sgrub pa ste gnyis ka yang mchog tu bde ba
T02D1845:166a-28: bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa la rgyal ba lnga po
T02D1845:166a-29: bzhugs pa'o // de ltar na 'di thams cad thob pa ni rigs pa ma yin te /
T02D1845:166a-30: sngar gyi 'dod chags chen po'i tshul //
T02D1845:166a-31: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gcig bu nyid las
T02D1845:166a-32: gzhan dag ni ma thos pa yin pa'i phyir dbang
T02D1845:166a-33: bskur rtsom pa la ting nge 'dzin gang sems can
T02D1845:166a-34: rnam par dag pa'i rgyu dang /
T02D1845:166a-35: dbang bskur ba dag ni bcu bdun pa las /
T02D1845:166a-36: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag
T02D1845:166a-37: na rdo rje 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyi
T02D1845:166a-38: dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
T02D1845:166a-39: zhugs te zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher
T02D1845:166a-41: de dang lhan cig pa nyid du tshig bzhi pa 'di'i don /
T02D1845:166a-42: mchog tu rjes chags phun tshogs dpag med kyis //
T02D1845:166b-0: zhes bya ba la @166b sogs pa tshigs su bcad
T02D1845:166b-1: pa bzhis kun du bzang po'i sgrub pa'i thabs las
T02D1845:166b-3: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1845:166b-4: nas gnas par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis
T02D1845:166b-5: tshig gnyis pas gsol ba gdab pa gnyis pa dang
T02D1845:166b-6: yang dag par sbyar ba yin no //
T02D1845:166b-7: mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga dang 'brel
T02D1845:166b-8: ba sku bstan pas ston pa'i rnam pa gnyis bshad
T02D1845:166b-9: pa ni byang chub kyi sems rdo rje ni stong
T02D1845:166b-10: pa nyid dang thugs rdo rje dbyer mi phyed pa
T02D1845:166b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa
T02D1845:166b-13: ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dbyangs la sogs
T02D1845:166b-14: par snang ba yang dag par rig pa mthar thug
T02D1845:166b-15: pas 'bras bu'i tshul rdo rje 'chang ba'i yul so
T02D1845:166b-16: sor snang ba dang bral bas gang gis byed pa'i
T02D1845:166b-17: ting nge 'dzin de ni mi phyed pas na rdo
T02D1845:166b-18: rje ste de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02D1845:166b-19: phyed pa'i tshig gi don ni nges pa med pa yin pas na /
T02D1845:166b-20: dang po'i don drug bar byas pa yin no //
T02D1845:166b-21: zhugs ma thag tu zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02D1845:166b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di
T02D1845:166b-23: ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid yin pas nam
T02D1845:166b-24: mkha'i dbyings so // de nas zhes bya ba ni
T02D1845:166b-25: zil gyis gnon pa'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas
T02D1845:166b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku dang dbyangs dang
T02D1845:166b-27: mkha'i dbyings so // / mtshan yongs su gyur nas
T02D1845:166b-28: zla ba gnyis kyi rnam par zhu bar gyur pa
T02D1845:166b-29: la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo
T02D1845:166b-31: de'i ngo bo ni de'i rang bzhin du gnas par gyur to //
T02D1845:166b-32: 'di dag gis bcu drug cha dang tshogs las byung
T02D1845:166b-33: ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad
T02D1845:166b-35: rgyud 'dir dbyangs dang gsal byed yongs su gyur pa'i
T02D1845:166b-36: zla ba gnyis so zhes bya ba la nyes pa
T02D1845:166b-37: med du zin kyang stong pa nyid dang thugs rje
T02D1845:166b-38: chen po dbyer mi phyed pa'i byang chub kyi sems
T02D1845:166b-39: kyi bdag nyid can du gyur bar bcom ldan 'das
T02D1845:166b-41: de yang gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir aa
T02D1845:166b-42: ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o zhes bya ba la
T02D1845:166b-44: aa la sogs pa'i yi ge ni dngos po ma
T02D1845:166b-45: lus par rab tu 'gog pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
T02D1845:167a-2: de bas na de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pas rgyur
T02D1845:167a-3: gyur ba yin par bcom ldan 'das ston par mdzad
T02D1845:167a-4: pa yin no // ngo bo nyid kyis stong par
T02D1845:167a-5: gyur pa la lar rnam pa la sogs par nges
T02D1845:167a-6: par snang ba'i tshul rang gi sems so sor rtog
T02D1845:167a-7: pa yi ge aa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1845:167a-8: pa yin no // rgyu ste / de nyid ni la lar bsdu bar byas te /
T02D1845:167a-9: shes rab dam par nges par snang zhing mchog tu bde ba bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
T02D1845:167a-10: stong pa nyid kyi rgyur gyur pa nyid kyis rang gi ngo bo bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir /
T02D1845:167a-11: byang chub kyi sems kyang ngo bo nyid du gyur
T02D1845:167a-12: pa'i thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi ka la sogs
T02D1845:167a-13: par nges par snang ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1845:167a-14: gnyis pa'i rgyu'o // de nyid thabs su snang ba'i
T02D1845:167a-15: bdag nyid can 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba'i stobs
T02D1845:167a-16: kyis yongs su gyur pa yin no //
T02D1845:167a-17: de bas na rgyud gzhan las bshad pa'i don rjes
T02D1845:167a-18: su mthun pa med pas 'dus pa dang rjes su
T02D1845:167a-19: mthun pa'i yi ge nyid kyis kyang gyur pa nyid
T02D1845:167a-20: do // bcu drug cha dang tshogs las byung ba'i
T02D1845:167a-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas ye shes
T02D1845:167a-22: kyi zhal snga nas kyis bshad pa yin no //
T02D1845:167a-23: tshig bzhi pa dang 'brel ba'i lnga pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1845:167a-24: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D1845:167a-25: de nas zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i rjes
T02D1845:167a-26: thogs nyid la'o // nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad na
T02D1845:167a-27: gnas pa'i zhes bya ba ni rang gi rigs pa'i
T02D1845:167a-28: chos 'byung ba'i nang du chud pa'i khang pa brtsegs
T02D1845:167a-30: rdo rje sems dpa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis zhes bya
T02D1845:167a-31: ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su
T02D1845:167a-32: zhugs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i dbang bskur ba thob
T02D1845:167a-33: pas yin gyi / bshad ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi stobs kyis ni ma yin te /
T02D1845:167a-34: grol ba nyid du thal bar gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1845:167a-35: dbyangs la sogs par nges par snang ba yongs su
T02D1845:167a-36: gyur pa'i zla ba gnyis yongs su gyur pa'i gzugs
T02D1845:167a-37: can gyi rnam pa gzhan du gyur ba ni de
T02D1845:167a-38: nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshig gsum pa
T02D1845:167a-40: de nas zhes bya ba ni zla ba gnyis kyi rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02D1845:167a-41: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D1845:167a-42: dang thugs rdo rje ni re re zhing ye shes
T02D1845:167b-0: lnga'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir @167b rdo rje'o
T02D1845:167b-1: // de rnams kyi dam tshig ni rgyal ba thams
T02D1845:167b-2: cad kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa de
T02D1845:167b-3: nyid de de nyid rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
T02D1845:167b-4: de 'byung ba ni bskyed pa ste /
T02D1845:167b-5: ting nge 'dzin gang las zla ba gnyis yang dag
T02D1845:167b-6: par rig pa rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid can dbyer
T02D1845:167b-7: mi phyed par gyur pa de la snyoms par zhugs
T02D1845:167b-8: pa ni thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'o //
T02D1845:167b-9: rig pa dang yang dag par 'dus pa'i skyes bu'i gzugs kyang yin la /
T02D1845:167b-10: chen po yang yin pas na /
T02D1845:167b-11: rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i gzugs te /
T02D1845:167b-12: de nyid kyis na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1845:167b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la /
T02D1845:167b-14: sngags kyang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags ste /
T02D1845:167b-15: de rnams kyi byin gyis rlabs ni rgyud de byin gyis brlabs par gyur pa'o //
T02D1845:167b-16: bcom ldan 'das de nyid ces bya ba ni gang
T02D1845:167b-17: 'di zil gyis gnon pa'i ting nge 'dzin la sngar
T02D1845:167b-18: bzhugs so // zhal gsum pa lta bur zhes bya
T02D1845:167b-19: ba ni dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po
T02D1845:167b-20: bzhugs so // lta bu'o // 'di dag kyang nga rgyal de ldan zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D1845:167b-21: rgyal ba skyed byed nyid kyi sku ru bsam //
T02D1845:167b-22: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung dang sbyor ro //
T02D1845:167b-23: lnga pa'i rjes thogs kyi tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1845:167b-24: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1845:167b-25: de nas zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang yid bde ba thob pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02D1845:167b-26: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs su gtogs shing /
T02D1845:167b-27: de sa bon las skyes pa'i sems can la 'dir
T02D1845:167b-28: mi bskyod pa'i sgrar gzung gi bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis
T02D1845:167b-29: byung ba ni ma yin te /
T02D1845:167b-30: de ni rdzogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1845:167b-31: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang shes par bya ste /
T02D1845:167b-32: de thog ma byas pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1845:167b-33: chos kyi dbyings rdo rje'i mthar thug pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1845:167b-35: sems can rigs de dang de zla ba zhu bar
T02D1845:167b-36: gyur pa'i de kho na nyid kyis dbang bskur zhing
T02D1845:167b-37: sa bon de yongs su gyur pa'i mtshan ma'i rim
T02D1845:167b-38: gyis de dang de bzhin gshegs par gyur nas thugs
T02D1845:167b-39: ka nas zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i chos 'byung ba
T02D1845:168a-0: gnas so // ched kar rjod pas na ched du @168a * //
T02D1845:168a-2: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa ste /
T02D1845:168a-3: gdul bya'i dbang gis sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can nyid
T02D1845:168a-4: kyis byang chub kyi sems nyid zla ba zhu ba
T02D1845:168a-5: zhes bya bar rab tu 'byung ba'o //
T02D1845:168a-6: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi'o //
T02D1845:168a-7: gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin pas na gsang ba'o //
T02D1845:168a-8: rtag pa'i don gyi ma rig pa'i tshul can ngang
T02D1845:168a-9: gis 'byung ba'i chos kyis spangs pa yin pas na
T02D1845:168a-10: rab tu mi rtog ces bya'o //
T02D1845:168a-11: de nyid kyis na dri ma med pas na rnyog pa med pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1845:168a-13: sa yi snying po phyag na rdo rje dang //
T02D1845:168a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lngas bshad pa'i don la bshad pa yin no //
T02D1845:168a-15: da ni bcom ldan 'das phal cher gsol ba 'debs
T02D1845:168a-16: pa sngon du 'gro bas chos ston par mdzad pa
T02D1845:168a-17: yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir te /
T02D1845:168a-18: tshig dang po gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1845:168a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa ni gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
T02D1845:168a-20: des sangs rgyas pa ni nam mkha'i dbyings khyab pa'o //
T02D1845:168a-21: de nyid ni de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig ste rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
T02D1845:168a-22: de nyid ni rin thang med pas na rin po che'o //
T02D1845:168a-23: de'i sprin gyis zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D1845:168a-24: 'dus pa ni 'du bar mdzad pa ste bshad ma
T02D1845:168a-25: thag pa'i gsang ba las byung ba ni rgyu ste
T02D1845:168a-26: 'di ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i gsol pa'o //
T02D1845:168a-27: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
T02D1845:168a-28: de rnams kyi snying po gang du btus pa de ni 'byin pa'i sngags kyi tshogs sam /
T02D1845:168a-29: de'i don yin pas na de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1845:168a-30: de nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang ba zhes bya ste /
T02D1845:168a-31: nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1845:168a-32: de nyid ces bya ba ni 'bras bu yongs su
T02D1845:168a-33: rdzogs pa'i tshul te nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'i bdag
T02D1845:168a-34: nyid can no // 'di ni 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs pa'i gsol ba'o //
T02D1845:168a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang the tshom skyed
T02D1845:168a-36: par byed pa yin zhes bya ba ni rgyud gzhan
T02D1845:168a-37: dag tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i sa 'og ma
T02D1845:168a-38: pa rnams 'khor bar byed pa ste /
T02D1845:168a-39: de rnams ni de kho na nyid ma rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1845:168a-41: gong ma gong ma'i khyad par gyis //
T02D1845:168b-0: @168b zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
T02D1845:168b-1: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan lta ci smos zhes bya
T02D1845:168b-2: ba ni byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang
T02D1845:168b-3: po'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag lta shin tu
T02D1845:168b-5: chos 'di ni the tshom gyi rgyur gyur pa yin no //
T02D1845:168b-7: yang na dngos su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams the tshom gyi rgyur gyur pa ma yin te /
T02D1845:168b-8: 'on kyang chos nyid kyis shin tu zab par bstan pa'i mchog gi tshig 'di yin no //
T02D1845:168b-9: spyi tsam gyis dam pa ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa'o //
T02D1845:168b-10: mi srid par shes pa ni rmad du gyur pa'o //
T02D1845:168b-11: yang na ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni rgyu'o //
T02D1845:168b-12: rmad du gyur pa ni 'bras bu'o //
T02D1845:168b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs
T02D1845:168b-14: pa ni de kho na nyid mnyam pa'i snod du
T02D1845:168b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rdo rje ste /
T02D1845:168b-18: rdo rje gang yin pa las byung ba'i dam tshig
T02D1845:168b-19: ni yongs su dag pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma
T02D1845:168b-20: dang chu dang sman la sogs pa'o //
T02D1845:168b-21: de las byung ba gang yin pa ste /
T02D1845:168b-22: gang gi tshe ming gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1845:168b-23: de rig ma'i padma'i khong na gnas pa'i 'khor lo
T02D1845:168b-24: la dbang bskur ba la sogs pas slob ma rnam
T02D1845:168b-25: par sbyangs te / snod du rung bar byas nas
T02D1845:168b-26: yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes pa'i don to
T02D1845:168b-27: par sbyangs te / // 'di ni dang po'i rnal 'byor bstan pa'i gzhung yin no //
T02D1845:168b-28: da ni dkyil 'khor gyi mchog ston par byed pa
T02D1845:168b-29: dkyil 'khor 'byin pa ni de nas zhes bya ba
T02D1845:168b-30: la sogs pa tshig bdun pas ston te /
T02D1845:168b-31: ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so ;
T02D1845:168b-32: / de nyid ni 'od gsal ba yin pas na sgron ma'o //
T02D1845:168b-33: de nyid ni mi phyed pas rdo rjer gyur pa'i
T02D1845:168b-34: ting nge 'dzin rdo rje 'chang ba lta bu'i ting
T02D1845:168b-35: nge 'dzin de nyid la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02D1845:168b-36: zhe sdang ni dgra bo'i rgyud dang de las yang
T02D1845:168b-37: dag par byung ba ral gri la sogs pa 'dzin
T02D1845:168b-38: pa'i mtshan nyid la khro bo zhes bya ba'i zhe
T02D1845:168b-39: sdang ba nyid ni khro bo ma yin te /
T02D1845:168b-40: khro bar ma gyur kyang dgra bo'i rgyu srid pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1845:168b-41: de nyid ni rigs kyang yin zhing bstan pa'i bdag nyid can gyi mgon po ste /
T02D1845:168b-42: de'i bdag nyid can gyi sngags so //
T02D1845:169a-0: de nyid ni grangs med pa'i rigs kyi bdag nyid can yin pas na mchog @169a * //
T02D1845:169a-2: / mi g-yo bas na snying po'o //
T02D1845:169a-3: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rab tu stsol ba nyid kyis na snying po'o //
T02D1845:169a-4: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'og nas bshad pa'o //
T02D1845:169a-5: nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las
T02D1845:169a-6: zhes bya ba ni khyad par med kyang yongs su
T02D1845:169a-7: gyur pa'i bye brag gis bstan pa'o //
T02D1845:169a-8: de nyid kyi phyir de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1845:169a-9: mi bskyod pa nyid phyag rgya chen pos rang snang
T02D1845:169a-10: ba'i rig pa dang yang dag par sbyor bas na
T02D1845:169a-11: phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'o //
T02D1845:169a-12: de nyid dpag tu med pa'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi
T02D1845:169a-13: thabs kyi mchog gi 'jug pa'i mdzad pas khyab pa'i
T02D1845:169a-14: phyir te / las yin yang gsum par byas so //
T02D1845:169a-17: dmar po'i tshul du zhes bya ba la /
T02D1845:169a-18: nag po ni rnam pa thams cad do //
T02D1845:169a-19: zhal g-yas pa ni dkar po'o //
T02D1845:169a-21: tshul 'dis na de nyid der bzhugs so zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1845:169a-22: bdag nyid kyi nang du thim par gyur pa'o ;
T02D1845:169a-24: cho ga 'di yis sems ni bstan pa dang //
T02D1845:169a-26: dngos po thams cad kyis ni dbyung bar bya //
T02D1845:169a-27: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung dang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1845:169a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ni gzugs brnyan du shes pa 'byung zhing /
T02D1845:169a-29: skye ba gang du rdo rje'i bdag nyid du gyur
T02D1845:169a-30: pa'i ting nge 'dzin me long lta bu'i tshul nyid
T02D1845:169a-31: du gyur pa de nyid la snyoms par zhugs te
T02D1845:169a-32: phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D1845:169a-33: gti mug ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1845:169a-34: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
T02D1845:169a-35: de la 'jig rten pa ni mi shes pa'i mtshan
T02D1845:169a-36: nyid dang 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i mtshan nyid do
T02D1845:169a-37: // de'i gnyen po gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
T02D1845:169a-38: kyi ngo bo phyogs med par dngos po thams cad
T02D1845:169a-39: la bdag go zhes bya ba de lta bu'i tshul
T02D1845:169a-40: gyi nga rgyal ni gti mug chen po ste gnyis
T02D1845:169a-41: // pa'o // de nyid ni rigs te zhes bya
T02D1845:169a-42: ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du sbyar
T02D1845:169a-43: // pa'o // bar bya'o // dkar po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
T02D1845:169a-44: zhal g-yas pa ni nag po'o //
T02D1845:169a-46: de nyid kyis na dzi na dzik / ces bya ba dang /
T02D1845:169a-47: sku rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bshad pa yin no //
T02D1845:169b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo @169b po
T02D1845:169b-1: nyid kyi rin po che ni mnyam pa nyid kyi
T02D1845:169b-2: ye shes so // de'i 'byung ba ni dngos po ma lus pa las skyes pa'o //
T02D1845:169b-3: de nyid ni mi phyed pa'i dpal yin pas na rdo rje dpal te /
T02D1845:169b-4: ting 'dzin gang la bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par
T02D1845:169b-5: byed par 'gyur bas ming de skad ces bya ba'i
T02D1845:169b-6: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02D1845:169b-7: nor bu yid bzhin nyid rigs yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D1845:169b-8: ser po ni rnam pa thams cad do //
T02D1845:169b-9: zhal g-yon pa ni dkar po'o //
T02D1845:169b-11: de nyid kyis na ratna dhrik / ces bya ba
T02D1845:169b-12: la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa smos pa yin
T02D1845:169b-13: no // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid 'dod
T02D1845:169b-14: chags chen po ste phyogs med pa can yin pa'i
T02D1845:169b-15: no // phyir ro // de'i 'byung ba ni skye ba ste so sor rtog pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1845:169b-16: de nyid ni mi phyed par ting nge 'dzin gang
T02D1845:169b-17: du gyur pa de la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes
T02D1845:169b-18: snga ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1845:169b-19: padma rnam par dag ni 'dir 'dod chags te /
T02D1845:169b-20: de nyid ni rigs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D1845:169b-21: sems can gyi don la so sor rtog cing gzigs
T02D1845:169b-22: pas na 'jig rten de la 'byung 'jug tu gyur
T02D1845:169b-23: pa'o // de nyid ni rig pa'i bdag po chen po ste 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1845:169b-24: de nyid ni phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'o //
T02D1845:169b-25: de nyid ni thabs kyi mchog ste snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D1845:169b-26: dmar po ni rnam pa thams cad do //
T02D1845:169b-27: zhal g-yon pa ni dkar po'o //
T02D1845:169b-29: de nyid kyis na a'a ro lika / ces bya
T02D1845:169b-30: ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa smos pa
T02D1845:169b-31: yin no // phrag dog la spyod pa rnams la de rnam par dag pa'i thabs bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1845:169b-32: dam tshig ni snying rje chen pos bskyed pa'i phrag
T02D1845:169b-33: dog gis dgug pa mdzad nas nyams su blangs pa'i
T02D1845:169b-35: de nyid ni rigs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar bshad ba dang 'dra'o //
T02D1845:169b-36: ljang gu ni rnam pa thams cad do //
T02D1845:169b-37: zhal g-yon pa ni dkar po'o //
T02D1845:169b-39: de nyid kyis na pradzny'a dhrik / ces bya ba
T02D1845:169b-40: la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa smos pa yin
T02D1845:169b-41: no // ral pa thor tshugs 'chang ba'i lha //
T02D1845:170a-0: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas bshad @170a * //
T02D1845:170a-2: ral pa cod pan mdzes dang sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D1845:170a-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don bshad pa yin te /
T02D1845:170a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1845:170a-5: yongs su gyur pa'i dbye ba rnam par dag pa las rigs kyi dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir ;
T02D1845:170a-6: zhe sdang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /
T02D1845:170a-7: gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems 'di ni 'dod pa zhes bya ste /
T02D1845:170a-8: de rnam par dag pas grol ba yin te /
T02D1845:170a-9: de'i bdag nyid can yig mi gnas pa rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o //
T02D1845:170a-11: rigs lnga po 'di dag ni shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can te /
T02D1845:170a-12: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi 'dod chags la
T02D1845:170a-13: sogs pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis bsgoms par gyur
T02D1845:170a-14: na / sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i 'bras bu rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
T02D1845:170a-15: da ni lha mo rnams kyi gdon pa bstan pa'i
T02D1845:170a-16: phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D1845:170a-17: te / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid ni rdo rje 'dzin pa mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1845:170a-18: de nyid ni m'a ma k'i la rjes su mnyes pas mnyes pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1845:170a-19: de nyid ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas
T02D1845:170a-20: na dam tshig ste ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
T02D1845:170a-21: zhugs nas so // rdo rje 'dzin thams cad ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1845:170a-22: de'i phun sum tshogs pa'i mchog gi rgyur gyur pa'i
T02D1845:170a-23: btsun mo'i mchog ni m'a ma k'i ste de phyung
T02D1845:170a-24: ngo zhes pa'o // mi bskyod pa rjes su mnyes
T02D1845:170a-25: pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byung bas na mi bskyod
T02D1845:170a-26: pa'i rigs dang 'brel ba ni m'a ma k'i ste
T02D1845:170a-27: rigs kyi rnam par gzhag pa 'di lta bu ni
T02D1845:170a-28: gzhan dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1845:170a-29: 'di rnams zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi bdag nyid can m'a ma k'i phyung ba'o //
T02D1845:170a-30: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D1845:170a-31: shar phyogs kyi grvar zhes bya ba ni padma'i nang
T02D1845:170a-32: na mtshams gang du m'a ma k'i bzhugs pa de
T02D1845:170a-33: nyid mtshams su bzhugs pa ste de yang bden bral
T02D1845:170a-35: la las lho phyogs kyi mtshams su zhes smos pa ni go sla ba nyid yin te /
T02D1845:170a-36: de nyid kyis na bden bral mtshams su bsam zhes bya ba smos pa yin no //
T02D1845:170a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang
T02D1845:170b-0: mdzad de de ni spyan la rjes @170b su mnyes
T02D1845:170b-2: de nyid mi phyed par gang du gyur pa'i me
T02D1845:170b-3: long lta bu de nyid la ting nge 'dzin du
T02D1845:170b-4: mdzad pa ste bshad zin to //
T02D1845:170b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par sang
T02D1845:170b-6: mdzad de de'i btsun mo'i mchog ces bya ba la
T02D1845:170b-7: sogs pa ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D1845:170b-8: lho phyogs kyi grvar zhes bya ba ni me'i mtshams so //
T02D1845:170b-9: de nyid kyis na mo ha ra ti zhes pas
T02D1845:170b-10: lha mo spyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos
T02D1845:170b-11: pa yin no // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1845:170b-12: kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa rjes su mnyes par byed
T02D1845:170b-13: pa rdo rje zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu
T02D1845:170b-14: pa yin no // med pa'o / nub phyogs kyi grvar zhes bya ba ni rlung gi mtshams su'o //
T02D1845:170b-15: de nyid kyis na r'a ga ra ti zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T02D1845:170b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D1845:170b-17: dang thugs zhes pa ni gdon mi za bar grub
T02D1845:170b-18: pa ste / de'i sgrol mas rang gi bdag por
T02D1845:170b-19: nang du chud pas bskyed pa'i phrag dog gi ngo
T02D1845:170b-20: bo nyid kyi 'khor lo'i gtso bos phyi dang gsang
T02D1845:170b-21: ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis khyad par du gsal bar
T02D1845:170b-22: byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang du rdo rje ltar
T02D1845:170b-23: mi phyed par gyur pa de la snyoms par zhugs
T02D1845:170b-24: pa ste / pa'o // de bzhin du ting nge
T02D1845:170b-25: 'dzin snga ma rnams la yang ci rigs par sbyar
T02D1845:170b-26: pa ste / pa'o // bar bya'o // yang na
T02D1845:170b-27: gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
T02D1845:170b-28: gsung dang thugs de rnams kyi slu ba ni dmigs
T02D1845:170b-29: pa ste / pa'o // bar bya'o // su med
T02D1845:170b-30: pa'o // yang na gang dag nyid kyis 'gro ba
T02D1845:170b-31: rnams kyi don bya'i gzhan dag gis ni ma yin
T02D1845:170b-32: no zhes phrag dog rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo
T02D1845:170b-33: rnam pa thams cad du bya ba sgrub pa'i ye
T02D1845:170b-35: de nyid ni rdo rje dang 'dra bar gang du
T02D1845:170b-36: gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gdon mi za bar grub
T02D1845:170b-37: pa'i bdag nyid can la de skad ces bya ste
T02D1845:170b-38: / de la snyoms par zhugs zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02D1845:170b-39: byang phyogs kyi grvar zhes bya ba ni dbang ldan gyi phyogs su te /
T02D1845:170b-40: badzra tis rab bskul zhes bya pa la sogs pa smos pa yin no //
T02D1845:170b-41: lag tu 'khor lo bsgom par bya //
T02D1845:170b-42: zhes bya ba la sogs pa le'u bcu gsum pa las gsungs pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1845:170b-43: 'khor lo bzang dang autpala dmar po zhes bya ba
T02D1845:170b-44: la sogs pas bshad pa rnams ni phyag mtshan gyi
T02D1845:170b-45: gtso bo la sogs pa'i nges pa yin te 'di
T02D1845:171a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid ni btsun mo'i mchog yin pa'am /
T02D1845:171a-3: de rnams kyi btsun mo'i mchog ste de'i bdag nyid can gyi phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1845:171a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog
T02D1845:171a-5: nyid du gyur pa'i lha mo 'di rnams kyang mchod
T02D1845:171a-6: pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la sogs par shes
T02D1845:171a-7: par bya ste / gang sku'i ngo bo nyid kyis
T02D1845:171a-8: sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas bshad
T02D1845:171a-9: par bya ste / pa yin gyi / dkyil 'khor
T02D1845:171a-10: gyi gnas kyi sa la sogs pa rnam par dag
T02D1845:171a-11: pa'i btsun mo nyid du ni ma yin te /
T02D1845:171a-12: rnam par dag pa dang 'gal bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1845:171a-13: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bgegs
T02D1845:171a-14: 'joms par byed pa'i sgo srung gdon pa gsungs pa
T02D1845:171a-15: yin te / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni
T02D1845:171a-16: rnam par snang mdzad de de'i dkyil 'khor ni sku'i
T02D1845:171a-17: yin te / dkyil 'khor ro // de byin gyis
T02D1845:171a-18: rlob pa ni dgug pa'i las kyis byang chub bskyed
T02D1845:171a-19: pa la chags par gang gis byed pa de la
T02D1845:171a-21: khro bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1845:171a-22: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi chos rtogs par bya ba'i tshul rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D1845:171a-23: gcig pa la sogs pa dang bral bar dran pa de la nye bar 'jog cing /
T02D1845:171a-24: de rnams la dad pa rnam par dag pa brten
T02D1845:171a-25: pa po'i tshul ni gshin rje mthar byed ces bya'o
T02D1845:171a-26: // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02D1845:171a-27: de nyid ni le lo can gyi gdul bya'i sems can rnams gdul ba'i dbang gis bsnyems par bya'o //
T02D1845:171a-28: des na shar phyogs kyi sgor zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1845:171a-29: sku gsung thugs kyi chos rnams la //
T02D1845:171a-30: gcig dang du ma sogs bral ba /
T02D1845:171a-31: de dran der ni dad pa gang //
T02D1845:171a-32: shar gyi sgor ni rtogs byar 'dod //
T02D1845:171a-34: de nyid kyis na ya m'anta krita ces bya gshin
T02D1845:171a-35: rje gshed ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su
T02D1845:171a-36: bcad pa gnyis smras pa yin no //
T02D1845:171a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par byang
T02D1845:171a-38: chub pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te
T02D1845:171a-39: / de'i rang gi ngo bo nyid gnas pa'i rgyu'o //
T02D1845:171a-40: de nyid kyis na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1845:171a-41: kyi rang gi rigs kyi bdag po ni mi bskyod
T02D1845:171b-0: pa ste / de'i ting nge 'dzin @171b gang du
T02D1845:171b-1: ma mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa mi bskyod
T02D1845:171b-2: pa lta bu de nyid la snyoms par zhugs pa'o
T02D1845:171b-3: pa ste / // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02D1845:171b-4: de'i dkyil 'khor ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1845:171b-5: de byin gyis rlob pa ni 'jug pa'i las kyis so //
T02D1845:171b-6: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma dang 'dra'o ;
T02D1845:171b-7: / dngos po phyung ba'i phyin ci log gi bag
T02D1845:171b-8: chags bcom pa dang mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir
T02D1845:171b-9: dang ma byung ba'i de kho na nyid kyi bag
T02D1845:171b-10: chags bskyed pa dang gnas par bya ba'i phyir brtson
T02D1845:171b-12: de yang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams la spel ba dang sba bar spro bar bya'o ;
T02D1845:171b-13: / de rnam par dag pa brten pa po'i ngo bo ste shes rab mthar byed do //
T02D1845:171b-14: rdo rje dam tshig ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02D1845:171b-15: de nyid ni snga ma bzhin bsnyems pa byed pa'o //
T02D1845:171b-16: des na lho phyogs kyi sgor zhes bya ba ni
T02D1845:171b-17: byung dang 'byung 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1845:171b-18: brtson 'grus bzhi bshad pa'i rten du gyur pa ni
T02D1845:171b-20: thar pa'i sgor 'jug par nges pa nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1845:171b-21: de bas na pradznhy'anta krita ces bya ba bla med
T02D1845:171b-22: 'od ces bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin
T02D1845:171b-23: no // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi
T02D1845:171b-24: bskyod pa la sogs pa ste de'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1845:171b-25: kyi chos ni rdo rje chos so //
T02D1845:171b-26: de nyid ni rin po che ste mngon par shes
T02D1845:171b-27: pa la sogs pa yon tan rnams kyi 'byung gnas
T02D1845:171b-28: su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de
T02D1845:171b-29: la 'od dpag tu med pa lta bur snyoms par
T02D1845:171b-30: 'jug pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1845:171b-31: 'dod chags 'chang ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa
T02D1845:171b-32: 'jug pa'o // ste / de'i dkyil 'khor ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1845:171b-33: de'i byin gyis rlob pa ni dgug pa dang gzhug
T02D1845:171b-34: pas sems can gyi khams rnams kyang rang gi gnas
T02D1845:171b-35: nas mi 'gro bar mngon par zhen pas 'jug pa'i
T02D1845:171b-36: phyir 'ching ba'i las can gyi ste lhag ma rnams
T02D1845:171b-38: phung po lnga po la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i
T02D1845:171b-39: nus pa'i dbye ba dang bral ba'i tshig ma yin
T02D1845:171b-40: pa'i bdag nyid can yin pas na /
T02D1845:171b-41: 'dun pa dang spro ba la gnas pa'i blo gros ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkyang pa ste /
T02D1845:171b-42: mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rdzogs pa ni rdzu 'phrul lo //
T02D1845:171b-43: de'i rkyang ba ni rgyu rnams so //
T02D1845:172a-1: rnams la 'dun pa la sogs pas dmigs par byed
T02D1845:172a-2: pa la mi brjed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dran
T02D1845:172a-3: pa dang brtson 'grus rtsom pa la nye bar gnas
T02D1845:172a-4: shing / dmigs pa brjed pa'i gnyen po la kun
T02D1845:172a-5: du spyod pas 'dun pa med pa la sogs pa
T02D1845:172a-7: de yang dran pa dang 'dun pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1845:172a-8: yul rnams kyi chos bkag pas bslang ba'i brten pa
T02D1845:172a-9: po'i ngo bo ni padma ste /
T02D1845:172a-10: de nyid ni 'dun pa med pa la sogs pa mthar byed pa yin no //
T02D1845:172a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung ni 'dod pa dpag tu med pa ste /
T02D1845:172a-12: de lta bu'i tshul du nub phyogs kyi sgor zhes
T02D1845:172a-13: bya ba 'dun pa la sogs pa'i yul la dran
T02D1845:172a-14: pa'i rten du gyur pa ni nub kyi sgo yin
T02D1845:172a-15: te / der zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1845:172a-16: de bas na pad m'anta krita ces bya ba la
T02D1845:172a-17: sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis smos pa yin
T02D1845:172a-18: no // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid ni
T02D1845:172a-19: sku dang gsung dang thugs te chos kyi dbyings kyi
T02D1845:172a-20: no // ye shes so // de nyid ni mi
T02D1845:172a-21: phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la
T02D1845:172a-22: mi bskyod pa lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02D1845:172a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang
T02D1845:172a-24: mdzad la sogs pa ste de rnams kyi sku la
T02D1845:172a-26: de rnams kyi byin gyis rlob pa ni dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang /
T02D1845:172a-27: bcing bas le lo la mngon par zhen pa'i sems
T02D1845:172a-28: can gyi khams rnams la dga' ba'i bya bas byin
T02D1845:172a-29: gyis rlob pa'o // lhag ma ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D1845:172a-30: rnam par mi rtog pa'i sngar bshad pa'i dngos po
T02D1845:172a-31: rnams la ting nge 'dzin sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan
T02D1845:172a-32: nyid can gyi sems rab tu dang ba la spro
T02D1845:172a-33: bas dmigs shing brjed pa med pas yongs su bskor
T02D1845:172a-34: ba'i chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa mngon sum
T02D1845:172a-35: du byed pa'i stobs rnams dang ldan pa'i brten pa
T02D1845:172a-36: po'i // ma dad pa la sogs pa'i bgegs rnams mthar byed pas na bgegs mthar byed do //
T02D1845:172a-37: byang sgor zhes bya ba ni ma dad pa la
T02D1845:172a-38: sogs pa'i bgegs rnams mthar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1845:172a-39: stobs dang ldan pa'i rten du gyur pa'i sgo ste
T02D1845:172a-40: / der bzhugs zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1845:172a-41: de bas na bighn'an ta krita ces bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin no //
T02D1845:172b-0: rnam par snang mdzad thugs @172b gtso 'od dpag med //
T02D1845:172b-1: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas ni dbang bskur bshad pa yin no //
T02D1845:172b-2: rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan la sogs pa'i nges pa yang /
T02D1845:172b-3: bri ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su 'brangs nas khro bo rnams la ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1845:172b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni sku'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1845:172b-5: gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D1845:172b-6: dkyil 'khor de rnams mnyes par byed pa'i phyir thun
T02D1845:172b-7: mong gi dam tshig sems dpa' ni bgegs mthar byed
T02D1845:172b-8: do // cig shes dag kyang rang rang gi dkyil
T02D1845:172b-9: 'khor mnyes par byed pa'i phyir dam tshig sems dpar
T02D1845:172b-10: do // 'gyur mod kyi / 'on kyang dad pa
T02D1845:172b-11: la sogs pa'i dbang po mnyam pa med pa'i ting
T02D1845:172b-12: nge 'dzin las yang dag par byung ba'i mnyes pa
T02D1845:172b-13: ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa la thogs pa
T02D1845:172b-15: gang gi phyir dad pas bkug la dad pa dang ldan pa ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
T02D1845:172b-16: brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar 'jog go //
T02D1845:172b-17: dran pa 'jog pa rnams ni dgug pa la sems mnyam par 'jug go //
T02D1845:172b-18: mnyam par 'jog pa'i sems kyis ni yang dag pa
T02D1845:172b-19: ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te dbang
T02D1845:172b-20: po rnams kyi rim pa 'di ni gshin rje gshed
T02D1845:172b-21: pa la sogs pa la mtshungs pa nyid yin no
T02D1845:172b-22: // de ltar na bzhi pa ni dam tshig gi sems dpa' yin no //
T02D1845:172b-23: de ltar khro bo rnams kyi 'khor phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba yin pas na /
T02D1845:172b-24: 'dir rnam par dag pa bshad pa yin no//
T02D1845:172b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02D1845:172b-26: lha mo rnams kyi 'khor rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni sngar bshad pa nyid yin no //
T02D1845:172b-27: gdon pa'i sngags de rnams kyi bshad pa ni bshad
T02D1845:172b-28: pa las gsal ba nyid du 'byung ba yin no
T02D1845:172b-29: // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
T02D1845:172b-30: gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid can gyi gsang ba
T02D1845:172b-32: de bas na gsang ba yang yin la 'dus pa yang yin te tshogs par bshad pa'o //
T02D1845:172b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de'i byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02D1845:172b-34: de ston par byed pa'i le'u'i gzhung rdzogs so //
T02D1845:173a-0: // / @173a * // da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1845:173a-1: gnyis pa don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi
T02D1845:173a-2: le'u ston te // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi
T02D1845:173a-3: zhes bya ba ni sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs
T02D1845:173a-4: pa dang chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D1845:173a-5: de nyid kyis na mchog go //
T02D1845:173a-6: de nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang ba'o ;
T02D1845:173a-8: bla na med pa'i byang chub sems //
T02D1845:173a-9: zhes bya ba ste 'di las gong na med pas na bla na med pa'o //
T02D1845:173a-10: 'dir 'og nas byang chub kyi bdag nyid can gyi
T02D1845:173a-11: sems bya ba man chad 'dir 'od de yang rigs
T02D1845:173a-12: pas dmigs su med pa yin te /
T02D1845:173a-13: de ni ngo bo nyid gcig pa gnyis su med
T02D1845:173a-14: pa'i tshul nyid dmigs su med do zhes bya bar
T02D1845:173a-15: dgongs so // de ltar na 'di ni rdo rje
T02D1845:173a-16: sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems gsungs pa yin no
T02D1845:173a-17: dgongs so // // da ni de nas zhes bya
T02D1845:173a-18: ba la sogs pas 'byin pa'i rim pa bor te
T02D1845:173a-19: dgongs so // // / sems lus lta bu dang
T02D1845:173a-20: zhes bya ba'i nye ba'i rim pa 'di nyid la
T02D1845:173a-21: dgongs so // // / brten nas / thugs kyi
T02D1845:173a-22: 'og tu sku'i ngo bo nyid rnams par snang mdzad
T02D1845:173a-23: kyi byang chub kyi sems gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1845:173a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gang du mngon par
T02D1845:173a-25: rtogs shing snang ba'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid can du
T02D1845:173a-26: gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs
T02D1845:173a-27: pa ste me long lta bu'i zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1845:173a-28: to // dngos po thams cad ces bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa ste /
T02D1845:173a-29: de dang bral zhing gzugs kyi phung po dang /
T02D1845:173a-30: khams dang skye mched rnams ni me long lta bu dang /
T02D1845:173a-31: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa //
T02D1845:173a-32: zhes bya ba gnyi gas bdag med par bshad pa yin no //
T02D1845:173a-33: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1845:173a-34: chos la bdag med mnyam nyid pas //
T02D1845:173a-35: zhes bya ba la gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1845:173a-36: rang sems zhes bya ba ni khyad par gzhan yang gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1845:173a-37: gzod nas ma skyes pa zhes bya ba ni gdod
T02D1845:173a-38: ma nyid nas brtags pa'i rnam pa ma skyes pa'o
T02D1845:173a-39: // stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1845:173a-40: zhes bya ba ni de nyid brten par byas pa yin no //
T02D1845:173a-41: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1845:173a-42: bskyod par byang chub kyis sems gsungs pa yin te
T02D1845:173a-43: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zad par mi
T02D1845:173a-44: 'gyur zhing nyams par mi 'gyur la chos kyi dbyings
T02D1845:173a-45: kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid gang du mi phyed
T02D1845:173b-0: pa'i gzugs su bzhugs pa @173b de ni mi bskyod
T02D1845:173b-1: pa lta bu nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes
T02D1845:173b-3: dngos po 'di rnams zhes bya ba ni phyi dang
T02D1845:173b-4: nang gi bdag nyid can gyi dngos po rnams so
T02D1845:173b-5: // ma skyes pas zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa'o //
T02D1845:173b-6: rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pas na chos so //
T02D1845:173b-7: de med pas na chos nyid med pa'o ;
T02D1845:173b-8: / de lta na ni med pa'i stong ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T02D1845:173b-9: nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pa //
T02D1845:173b-10: zhes bya ba gsungs te dmigs su med pa'i ye shes tsam zhes bya ba don to //
T02D1845:173b-11: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi byang chub kyi tshul gsungs pa /
T02D1845:173b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa
T02D1845:173b-13: nyid rdo rje ste mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam pa'o
T02D1845:173b-14: // de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1845:173b-15: chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing //
T02D1845:173b-16: zhes bya ba ni shes bya'i tshul gyis so //
T02D1845:173b-17: chos kyi mtshan ni gang gi phyir chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid /
T02D1845:173b-18: gzugs ni gzugs su rung ba'o ;
T02D1845:173b-19: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste de rnam par spangs pa'o //
T02D1845:173b-21: bya ba dang ni nyer 'dren kun //
T02D1845:173b-22: phung po la sogs khyad par du //
T02D1845:173b-23: mtshan nyid de yang de nyid de //
T02D1845:173b-24: des na 'di yang mtshan nyid bral //
T02D1845:173b-26: de nyid kyis na bdag med chos las te chos
T02D1845:173b-27: rnams bdag med pa ma yin par dgag pa la
T02D1845:173b-28: brten pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi sems pas kun du
T02D1845:173b-29: byung ba ste / de rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1845:173b-30: 'od dpag tu med pa'i byang chub kyi sems gsungs pa /
T02D1845:173b-31: ye shes nyid 'od zer yin te des na sems
T02D1845:173b-32: can gyi don la so sor rtog pas na sgron
T02D1845:173b-33: ma'o / de nyid rdo rje ltar gnyis su med
T02D1845:173b-34: pa'i gzugs can yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin
T02D1845:173b-35: pa de ni tshe dpag med lta bur zhes bya
T02D1845:173b-36: ma'o / ba'i don to // ma skyes pa ste
T02D1845:173b-37: bems po'i chos la ngo bo med pa zhes pa
T02D1845:173b-38: btags pa'i dngos po med cing de la sgom pa
T02D1845:173b-39: ma'o / ba'i don to // yang med pa'o // 'on na da ltar ci zhig yod ce na /
T02D1845:173b-40: nam mkha'i tshul du sbyor ba yis //
T02D1845:173b-42: dmigs su med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyis so //
T02D1845:173b-43: de ltar sngar bshad pa'i dngos po ste /
T02D1845:173b-44: gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin du rab tu bsgrags shing so sor rtog go zhes pa'o //
T02D1845:174a-0: gdon mi za bar grub pa'i byang chub kyi @174a * //
T02D1845:174a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa
T02D1845:174a-3: ni bdag nyid kyis sems can gyi don bya'o zhes
T02D1845:174a-4: phrag dog rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo bya ba
T02D1845:174a-5: sgrub pa'o // de nyid ni rdo rje ste gnyis
T02D1845:174a-6: su med pa'i bdag nyid can yin te de skad
T02D1845:174a-7: ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhes bya bar
T02D1845:174a-8: sgrub pa'o // sbyar ro // chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
T02D1845:174a-9: zhes bya ba ni sems kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1845:174a-10: gzod nas dag pa zhes bya ba ni bya ba
T02D1845:174a-11: sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi rang gi ngo bos gdod
T02D1845:174a-12: ma nyid nas dag pa yin gyi da ltar ni
T02D1845:174a-13: ma yin no // de nyid kyis na ston pas
T02D1845:174a-14: sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
T02D1845:174a-15: po can no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1845:174a-16: nam mkha' bzhin bya ba ni dmigs su med pa'o //
T02D1845:174a-17: byang chub med cing zhes bya ba ni 'di las tha mi dad pa'o //
T02D1845:174a-18: mngon par rtogs pa med ces bya ba ni lam
T02D1845:174a-19: tha dad par gyur pa yang yod pa ma yin
T02D1845:174a-20: te / byang chub dang lam gnyi ga yang de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1845:174a-21: de lta mod kyi goms par bslabs pa'i gnas skabs
T02D1845:174a-22: su mi gsal ba nyid kyis na gnyis su med
T02D1845:174a-23: pa'i ye shes de la lam gyi bden pa zhes
T02D1845:174a-24: bshad la / gsal ba'i gnas skabs su ni 'bras bu zhes bya'o //
T02D1845:174a-26: 'dir zhi ba dang srid pa'i ngo bo 'dir //
T02D1845:174a-27: chos nyid kyi ni dbye ba 'ga' yang med //
T02D1845:174a-28: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig su bcad pa smos pa yin no //
T02D1845:174a-29: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ngo
T02D1845:174a-30: mtshar du 'gyur pa sngon du 'gro ba'i ched du
T02D1845:174a-31: brjod pa'i thabs kyis sngar bshad pa'i don ston pa
T02D1845:174a-32: yin te / ae ma'o sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni kun du bzang po dang /
T02D1845:174a-33: byang chub kyi sems gnyis tha mi dad pas de la phyag 'tshal ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1845:174a-34: de bzhin du 'di'i 'og ma rnams pa yang byang
T02D1845:174a-35: chub kyi sems dang tha mi dad par shes par
T02D1845:174a-36: bya'o // byang chub sems ni rab bskor ba //
T02D1845:174a-37: zhes bya ba ni 'og gnas gdul bya'i dbang gis
T02D1845:174a-38: bya ba 'dir yang byang chub kyi bdag nyid can
T02D1845:174a-39: gyi sems yin pas na byang chub sems so //
T02D1845:174a-40: snying po zhes bya ba ni nye bar blang bar bya'o //
T02D1845:174a-41: gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs nyid la legs so
T02D1845:174a-42: zhes par bstan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' thams
T02D1845:174a-43: cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa
T02D1845:174b-0: yin te / yongs su rtog pa @174b zhes bya ba ni kun nas 'dri ba'i bsam pa'o //
T02D1845:174b-1: thugs kyis mkhyen nas zhes bya ba ni dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes nyid kyis so //
T02D1845:174b-2: sems lus lta bu dang zhes bya ba ni brtags pa'i rnam pa'i sems dgag pa'o //
T02D1845:174b-3: lus sems lta bu dang zhes bya ba ni brtags
T02D1845:174b-4: pa'i bems po'i lus dgag pa ste 'dis ni sems
T02D1845:174b-5: dang lus khyad par med par bshad pa yin no
T02D1845:174b-6: // sems tshig tu brjod pa zhes bya ba la
T02D1845:174b-7: sogs pas ni ngag dang sems kyang khyad par med
T02D1845:174b-9: de ltar na de ni khams gsum po rnams pa
T02D1845:174b-10: bcas pa ni shes pa tsam gyi ngo bo nyid
T02D1845:174b-11: yin no zhes ston pa yin no //
T02D1845:174b-12: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1845:174b-13: nyan pa po de rnams dngos po'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1845:174b-14: ci ltar gnas pa bzhin du de nyid rjes su
T02D1845:174b-15: brjod pa yin par sdud par byed pas smras pa
T02D1845:174b-16: yin te / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1845:174b-17: ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang gsung thugs nam mkha'
T02D1845:174b-18: lta bur zhes bya ba gnyis su med pa'i ye
T02D1845:174b-19: shes kyi tshul du yang dag par sbyar nas ched
T02D1845:174b-20: du brjod pa zhes bya ba ched kar brjod do
T02D1845:174b-21: zhes bya ba smras so zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1845:174b-22: yin te / // de gang zhig yin zhe na /
T02D1845:174b-23: ae ma'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1845:174b-24: brtags pa'i rnam pa med pa la sogs pa gang
T02D1845:174b-25: yin pa de'i skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis na
T02D1845:174b-26: dngos po gnas par gyur pa ni ma yin te
T02D1845:174b-27: / rnam pa sna tshogs pa skye ba'i de ni
T02D1845:174b-28: rab tu bsgrags shing bshad do zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1845:174b-29: / to // de ltar na 'dis ni chos nyid kyis spyir byang chub kyi sems bshad nas /
T02D1845:174b-30: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas
T02D1845:174b-31: drug po'i byang chub kyi sems re re nas gsungs
T02D1845:174b-32: pa yin te / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1845:174b-33: kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshul ting
T02D1845:174b-34: nge 'dzin gang du rdo rje dang 'dra bar 'gyur
T02D1845:174b-35: pa de la rdo rje 'chang ba lta bu nyid
T02D1845:174b-36: du snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar sbyor ro
T02D1845:174b-37: pa yin te / // dngos po med pa zhes
T02D1845:174b-38: bya ba ni med par dgag pa'i tshul du bsgom
T02D1845:174b-39: pa rnams kyi dngos po med pa'o //
T02D1845:174b-40: de ni gzung ba la sogs pa'i tshul du rnam
T02D1845:174b-41: par brtags pa'i sgom pa de yang bsgom pa ma
T02D1845:174b-42: yin te / yang dag pa ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1845:175a-0: de ltar zhes pa'i phyir dngos po de nyid yang dag par rig pa yin @175a * //
T02D1845:175a-1: par bshad pas dngos po med par 'gyur te brtags
T02D1845:175a-2: pa ni dngos po med pa yin pa'i phyir ro
T02D1845:175a-3: // ma yin par dgag pa la brten pas ni
T02D1845:175a-4: de las kyang yang dag par rig par bshad pa
T02D1845:175a-5: don dam par spong ba las gang tha dad par
T02D1845:175a-6: gyur pa'i sgom pa po'i bya bar 'dod pa ni
T02D1845:175a-8: / gdul bya'i dbang gis dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyis so //
T02D1845:175a-9: de la le'u 'di'i don nyid ni //
T02D1845:175a-10: snying rjes 'jig rten 'di ni ma lus pa //
T02D1845:175a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyi bshad pa yin no //
T02D1845:175a-14: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni le'u gsum pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1845:175a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phro ba nyid
T02D1845:175a-16: rlan dang bcas pa nyid yin pas na sprin no
T02D1845:175a-17: // de'i bkod pa ni tshogs so //
T02D1845:175a-18: de nyid ni rdo rje zhes pa rdo rje sems
T02D1845:175a-19: dpa' ste ting nge 'dzin de la zhes bya ba'i
T02D1845:175a-20: don to // byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa byin
T02D1845:175a-21: gyis rlob pa'i sngags gsungs pa ni aom zhes bya
T02D1845:175a-23: aom zhes bya ba ni lha'i sku'o sh'u nya t'a ni stong pa nyid de /
T02D1845:175a-24: de nyid ni dzny'a na ste ye shes so //
T02D1845:175a-25: de nyid ni badzr'a ste rdo rje yin no //
T02D1845:175a-26: sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba ni
T02D1845:175a-27: de'i ngo bo nyid kyi bdag nyid can ni bdag
T02D1845:175a-30: dngos las stong pa gzhan ma yin //
T02D1845:175a-31: de med par yang dngos po med //
T02D1845:175a-32: ces slob dpon klu sgrub kyis ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o //
T02D1845:175a-33: gzhi'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa ni nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba ste chos 'byung ba'o //
T02D1845:175a-34: de'i dbus gnas par sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zhes bya
T02D1845:175a-35: ba ni yi ge bhr'um gyi 'khor lo las byung
T02D1845:175a-36: ba'i rin po che'i cod pa na gyi rnam par
T02D1845:175a-37: snang mdzad yongs su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1845:175a-38: de yang bhr'um gyi 'khor lo las byung rig ma
T02D1845:175a-39: dang bcas pa'i rnam par snang mdzad yan lag las
T02D1845:175a-40: yang dag byung zhes ji skad bshad pa'o //
T02D1845:175a-41: sangs rgyas nyid 'bar ba ste de dang mnyam pa'i
T02D1845:175a-42: 'od zer mnga' ba gang yin pa de la de
T02D1845:175a-43: skad ces bya'o // de nyid kyis na /
T02D1845:175a-44: 'od zer sna lngas kun du khyab //
T02D1845:175a-47: thub dbang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D1845:175a-48: zer gyis phyogs tshogs ma lus kun du khyab //
T02D1845:175b-0: kun nas yongs su zlum por @175b te ;
T02D1845:175b-1: / zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang zlum po ste /
T02D1845:175b-2: dbus su ni zur bzhi ba nyid yin no //
T02D1845:175b-3: 'dod par bya ba yin pas na 'dod pa'o //
T02D1845:175b-4: de nyid ni rnam par dag pa nyid kyi tshul
T02D1845:175b-5: gyis goms shing bslab par bya ba yin pas na
T02D1845:175b-6: yon tan no // lnga ni gzugs la sogs pa ste des khyab pa'o //
T02D1845:175b-7: mchod pa rnam pa lnga ni lha bshos la sogs pa ste de rnams kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1845:175b-9: gzugs sogs yul rnams rnam par dag pa ni //
T02D1845:175b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa smos pa yin no //
T02D1845:175b-11: de ni mdor na de ltar zhes bya ba la
T02D1845:175b-12: sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa drug po'i sku mdog
T02D1845:175b-13: la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1845:175b-14: gzugs zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'o //
T02D1845:175b-15: dbus su zhes bya ba ni dbus ma'i gdan la'o //
T02D1845:175b-16: bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni yid kyis sam rngul tshon gyis so //
T02D1845:175b-17: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni lha'i sku'o //
T02D1845:175b-18: sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa'o //
T02D1845:175b-19: zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D1845:175b-20: de dag ni 'di'i 'og ma rnams la shes par bya'o //
T02D1845:175b-21: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang ba'i'o //
T02D1845:175b-22: phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni sku mdog la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D1845:175b-23: 'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni phyag mtshan gyi phyag
T02D1845:175b-24: rgya'am rdul tshon gang la yang rung ba bsgom par
T02D1845:175b-25: bya'o // 'di dag kyang gong ma dang 'og ma gnyis ka la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1845:175b-26: tshogs gnyis dang ni ldan pa yis //
T02D1845:175b-27: zhes bya ba ni ye shes dang bsod nams kyi
T02D1845:175b-28: tshogs rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo lha mo dang
T02D1845:175b-29: lha phor snang ba'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba dang
T02D1845:175b-30: ldan pa yis so// 'di yang gong ma dang 'og ma gnyis ka la yang sbyar shes par bya'o //
T02D1845:175b-31: 'dir ni rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa
T02D1845:175b-32: gnyis nye bar 'gyur pa dang ldan pa ni rdo
T02D1845:175b-33: rje 'chang rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku mdog dang
T02D1845:175b-34: mi bskyod pa'i phyag mtshan dang ldan pa'o zhes shes
T02D1845:175b-36: de gnyis kyis na 'di'i 'og nas 'di'i sku mdog la sogs pa mi ston to //
T02D1845:175b-38: zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i sku dang rtsa
T02D1845:175b-39: ba'i zhal ni sngon por bsgom par bya'o zhes bya
T02D1845:175b-40: ba'i don to // shel dang zhes bya ba la
T02D1845:175b-41: sogs pas ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku mdog
T02D1845:175b-42: la sogs pa ston pa yin no //
T02D1845:176a-1: zhes bya ba ni thams cad la sbyar bar bya ste /
T02D1845:176a-2: ral pa cod pan mdzes dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad smos pa lta bu'o //
T02D1845:176a-3: 'dzam bu chu bo'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1845:176a-4: ni rin chen dpal gyi sku mdog la sogs pa
T02D1845:176a-6: rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba ni bri ba'i
T02D1845:176a-7: dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su 'brang bas rin po che
T02D1845:176a-9: de nyid kyis na margad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1845:176a-10: padma r'a ga zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni
T02D1845:176a-11: 'od dpag tu med pa'i sku mdog la sogs pa
T02D1845:176a-13: 'od zer sna lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1845:176a-14: ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'i sku mdog la
T02D1845:176a-15: sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1845:176a-16: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1845:176a-17: rdzogs pa'i lha rnams byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags gsungs
T02D1845:176a-18: pa yin te / chos rnams kyi dbyings ni lus
T02D1845:176a-19: te rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal pa'i stong nyid yin
T02D1845:176a-20: pa yin te / la / de'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1845:176a-21: kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so zhes
T02D1845:176a-24: gzung 'dzin la sogs rnam bral bas //
T02D1845:176a-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin no //
T02D1845:176a-27: rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa //
T02D1845:176a-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sems nye bar g-yeng
T02D1845:176a-29: ba zhi bar bya ba'i phyir phra mo'i rnal 'byor
T02D1845:176a-30: bsgom pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1845:176a-31: rin chen zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha'i mtshan ma'i rin po che'o //
T02D1845:176a-32: sna'i rtse mo zhes bya ba ni lha mo'i gsang ba'i chu skyes kyi sna rtse'o //
T02D1845:176a-33: rtag par zhes bya ba ni ci srid sems rtse gcig par gyur gyi bar du'o //
T02D1845:176a-34: brtan par shes nas zhes bya ba ni brtan pa'i
T02D1845:176a-35: mtshan ma shes nas legs par rin po che'i mtshan
T02D1845:176a-37: spro ba'i mtshan ma bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas 'bar
T02D1845:176a-38: ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin
T02D1845:176a-39: te sangs rgyas kyi sprin spro bar bya'o zhes bya
T02D1845:176a-40: ba'i don to // rin po che'i mtshan ma 'ba'
T02D1845:176a-41: zhig tu ma zad kyi mtshan ma gzhan dang gzhan
T02D1845:176a-42: dag kyang spro bar bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1845:176a-43: 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1845:176a-44: smos te ral gri 'dzin pa'i phyag mtshan ni ral
T02D1845:176a-45: gri'o // spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis zhes bya
T02D1845:176a-46: ba ni de dag dbyer mi phyed pa'i blo yod
T02D1845:176a-47: gri'o // pas so // yang na sngar gyi phyag
T02D1845:176a-48: mtshan thams cad kyang mchog tu gyur pa yin pas
T02D1845:176a-49: na rin po che zhes bya ba la /
T02D1845:176b-0: de @176b las kyang brtan par byas nas mtshan ma
T02D1845:176b-1: lnga po nyid spro bar bya'o zhes bshad pa'i phyir
T02D1845:176b-2: 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1845:176b-3: gsungs so // 'dir yang mdzod 'dzin ni rin po che'o //
T02D1845:176b-6: yang na rang gi mtshan ma phra mo ni //
T02D1845:176b-7: zhes pa la sogs tshigs bcad gnyis smos pa yin no //
T02D1845:176b-8: da ni nam mkha'i dbyings zhes pa la sogs pas sangs rgyas rnams kyi gdan gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1845:176b-9: chos 'byung ba'i nang du chud pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus na gnas pa'o //
T02D1845:176b-10: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1845:176b-11: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bri bar bya'o //
T02D1845:176b-12: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1845:176b-13: de'i dbus su 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba
T02D1845:176b-14: rnam par snang mdzad bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i
T02D1845:176b-16: thams cad nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la bsam //
T02D1845:176b-17: zhes pa'i spyi'i tshig 'di la sngar gyi ;
T02D1845:176b-18: shar gyi padma zla ba'i dbus su bsam //
T02D1845:176b-19: zhes dgar pa'i tshig tu gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1845:176b-21: zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i dkyil
T02D1845:176b-22: 'khor de nyi ma la gnas par bsgom par bya'o
T02D1845:176b-23: // bzlas pa bsgom pas zhes bya ba ni sngags
T02D1845:176b-24: bzlas pa dang sgom pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1845:176b-25: // pas so // rin chen dkyil 'khor 'dra bar ni //
T02D1845:176b-26: zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan te nyi
T02D1845:176b-27: ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par rin po che la
T02D1845:176b-29: sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba //
T02D1845:176b-30: zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa
T02D1845:176b-31: bzhi dang 'brel ba'i sku mdog dang sbyor bas dkyil
T02D1845:176b-32: 'khor rang gi ngo bo'i bdag nyid can ljang gu
T02D1845:176b-33: gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste
T02D1845:176b-34: / gdon mi za ba grub pa yin par bshad la /
T02D1845:176b-35: de'i yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid du yang dag
T02D1845:176b-36: par byung zhing ldan par bya'o zhes pa'i don to
T02D1845:176b-37: // dris pa rnam par snang mdzad 'ba' zhig la
T02D1845:176b-38: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin par gsungs na de
T02D1845:176b-39: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gdan nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D1845:176b-41: ci ltar shes she na de brjod par bya ste /
T02D1845:176b-42: gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan //
T02D1845:176b-43: zhes gleng gzhi'i le'u las gsungs la /
T02D1845:177a-1: sogs pa zhes smos pas ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin par 'dod do //
T02D1845:177a-2: 'dir yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdan ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin pas /
T02D1845:177a-3: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i sgras nges pa nyid du gsungs la /
T02D1845:177a-4: don gyis na mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi'i
T02D1845:177a-5: gdan ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin par shes
T02D1845:177a-6: so // da ni 'di dag ces bya ba la
T02D1845:177a-7: sogs pas dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis sangs rgyas tha
T02D1845:177a-8: mi dad par gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1845:177a-9: dkyil 'khor 'di dag ni sangs rgyas rab mchog gi
T02D1845:177a-10: sku dang gsung dang thugs sgom pa la gcig pa
T02D1845:177a-11: nyid kyis sangs rgyas rab mchog go //
T02D1845:177a-12: rdo rje las byung ba'i zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa las yang dag par byung ba'o //
T02D1845:177a-13: thams cad 'dzin pa'i tshul ni thams cad mkhyen pa
T02D1845:177a-14: nyid tshul yin la tshul nyid kyang thams cad mkhyen
