T02D1845:242b-2: zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa tsam gyi ngo
T02D1845:242b-3: bo nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa lngar gyur pa ni
T02D1845:242b-4: / zhe sdang rdo rje la sogs pa bdag nyid chen po rnams te /
T02D1845:242b-5: de nas sngags kyi rgyun bsdus pa spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste /
T02D1845:242b-6: zhe sdang gi las la sogs pa 'di dag thams
T02D1845:242b-7: cad kyang so so rang rig pa nyid kyis rnam
T02D1845:242b-8: par dag pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so
T02D1845:242b-9: // da ni rgyud kyi don thams cad bstan pa'i sgo nas /
T02D1845:242b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bstod par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1845:242b-11: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1845:242b-12: dus gsum rdo rje thugs yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs yin pa'o //
T02D1845:242b-13: srid dang thar gyur zhes bya ba ni mi gnas
T02D1845:242b-14: pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i bdag nyid can no
T02D1845:242b-15: // nam mkha' dag pa'i ngo bo nyid //
T02D1845:242b-16: ces bya ba ni dmigs su med pa'i nam mkha' bzhin no //
T02D1845:242b-18: sangs rgyas la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1845:242b-19: 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa spros
T02D1845:242b-20: pa med pa'i tshul gyis nyid kyi don phun sum
T02D1845:242b-21: tshogs pa la phyag byas pa'o //
T02D1845:242b-22: spros pa'i bdag nyid las gzhan gyi don gyi sgo nas kyang phyag bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1845:242b-23: gang zhig gzugs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1845:242b-24: 'dir rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis ni phung po lnga bstan la /
T02D1845:242b-25: skye mched drug ni chos kyi skye mched kyi bar du'o //
T02D1845:242b-26: dbang po drug ni yid kyi dbang po'i mthar thug pa ste ;
T02D1845:242b-27: de dag gis ni skye mched bcu gnyis gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1845:242b-28: sa chu zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'byung ba lnga ston to //
T02D1845:242b-30: gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa lnga ni rnam
T02D1845:242b-31: par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid do
T02D1845:242b-32: // gzugs kyi skye mched la sogs pa bcu gnyis
T02D1845:242b-33: gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid do
T02D1845:242b-34: // // sa la sogs pa rnams ni spyan las sogs pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D1845:242b-35: de dag thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems rdo
T02D1845:242b-36: rje dang 'dra ba nyid du rgya che zhing yangs
T02D1845:242b-37: pa ste / spros pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02D1845:243a-1: thams cad la lus dang ngag yid kyi bdag nyid
T02D1845:243a-2: can gyi bya ba rnam pa gsum gyis rtag tu
T02D1845:243a-4: gti mug la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i tshul gyis kyang phyag bya bar bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1845:243a-5: gti mug ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1845:243a-6: nyes pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni zhe sdang gsungs so //
T02D1845:243a-7: rdo rje chos can zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags
T02D1845:243a-8: rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo rdo rje chos la
T02D1845:243a-9: bya bar mngon par 'dod do zhes zer ro //
T02D1845:243a-10: 'dir khro bo'i sgo nas kyang phyag bya ba yin par blta bar bya'o //
T02D1845:243a-11: spro ba la sogs pa'i sgo nas kyang bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1845:243a-12: spros dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1845:243a-13: spros dang zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o //
T02D1845:243a-15: rnam pa ni rang gi lha'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1845:243a-16: mi 'gyur ba ni brtan par bya'o //
T02D1845:243a-17: rgyu ni rnam pa bye brag la slob pa'o //
T02D1845:243a-18: 'bras bu ste de nyid gsal bar gyur ba dang /
T02D1845:243a-19: rang bzhin du gtogs pa'i chos gang yin pa ci yang rung ba dang /
T02D1845:243a-20: sems su gtogs pa'i chos gang yang rung ba dang /
T02D1845:243a-21: de bzhin du gti mug dang /
T02D1845:243a-25: nyon mongs pa ma lus pa'i ngo bo nyid la
T02D1845:243a-26: de dag thams cad rnam par dag pas na rdo
T02D1845:243a-27: rje ste / de bas na rdo rje 'dzin pa
T02D1845:243a-28: dang 'dra ba de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya
T02D1845:243a-29: rje ste / ba'i don to // 'di la sngar
T02D1845:243a-30: shes rab dang thabs las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1845:243a-31: rje ste / ba'i don to // du gsungs pa
T02D1845:243a-32: / gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang ldan par bsgom
T02D1845:243a-33: pa de yang rdo rje 'dzin pa dang 'dra bar
T02D1845:243a-34: bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1845:243a-35: gang zhig thog ma med dngos zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1845:243a-36: yan lag bzhi'i sbyor ba nyid kyis bsgom par bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1845:243a-37: gang zhig dngos grub mchog gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1845:243a-38: thun bzhir bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1845:243a-39: gang zhig thun bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1845:243a-40: mi snang ba la sogs pa ni lha la sogs pa'o //
T02D1845:243a-41: mchog dang dman bsgrub ces bya ba ni dngos grub mchog dang tha ma grub ste /
T02D1845:243b-0: 'dis ni rig @243b pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa
T02D1845:243b-1: grub pa'i sgrub pa pos kyang rim gyis sangs rgyas
T02D1845:243b-2: nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyur 'gyur ro
T02D1845:243b-4: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud nyan pa la sogs pa
T02D1845:243b-5: dang ldan pa rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi sa bon
T02D1845:243b-6: legs par thob pa yin pas phyag bya bar 'os
T02D1845:243b-8: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1845:243b-9: gang yang 'khrul 'khor dang sngags la sogs pa dang
T02D1845:243b-10: ldan pas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams grub
T02D1845:243b-11: par byed pa'i skye bo rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
T02D1845:243b-12: de yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mthus sdig pa'i
T02D1845:243b-13: las rnams dang bral bar gyur pas phyag bya bar
T02D1845:243b-14: 'os pa yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1845:243b-15: / gang zhig bsgrub bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1845:243b-16: 'khrul 'khor ni le'u bcu bzhi pa las gsungs pas so //
T02D1845:243b-17: sngags bshad pas zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rang gi sngags la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1845:243b-18: khyad par de rnams kyis zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs kyi phyogs ston pa yin no //
T02D1845:243b-19: gang yang de lta bur gyur pa'i slob dpon mthong ba dang /
T02D1845:243b-20: mi thos pa la sogs par yang mngon par dga' ba de rnams kyang dad pa'i khyad par gyis /
T02D1845:243b-21: mi dge ba'i las rnam par 'jig pas phyag bya
T02D1845:243b-22: bar 'os pa yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i
T02D1845:243b-23: phyir / gang gis gtso bo sgrub pa mthong //
T02D1845:243b-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1845:243b-25: sgrub pa po gtso bo zhes bya ba ni gnyis
T02D1845:243b-26: su med pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i slob dpon
T02D1845:243b-28: gang zhig mthong dang ldan pa dang //
T02D1845:243b-29: thams cad du ni mchod gyur na //
T02D1845:243b-30: sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang //
T02D1845:243b-31: mchod pa nyid du gyur pa yin //
T02D1845:243b-33: de ltar tshigs su bcad pa bcu po de dag gis ni bstod pa'i sgo nas /
T02D1845:243b-34: rgyud kyi don rjes su bshad pa bstan nas /
T02D1845:243b-35: da ni tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag nyid kyis
T02D1845:243b-36: don chen po ston pa'i phan yon bstan par bya
T02D1845:243b-37: ba'i phyir / bstod pa'i tshig ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1845:244a-1: pa'i rgyud 'di thams cad ni rgyud gzhan rnams las
T02D1845:244a-2: mchog tu gyur pa yin no zhes bstan par bya
T02D1845:244a-3: ba'i phyir / 'dus pa gsungs pa las byung ba //
T02D1845:244a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1845:244a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams la sogs pa ji
T02D1845:244a-6: ltar gsungs pa'i de nyid kyi don mngon du bya
T02D1845:244a-7: ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur te zhes bstan
T02D1845:244a-9: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1845:244a-11: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i zhes bya ba
T02D1845:244a-12: ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku rdo rje la sogs
T02D1845:244a-13: pa ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi nyid kyi
T02D1845:244a-14: sku dang gsung dang thugs la rang rig pa tsam
T02D1845:244a-15: nyid kyi de dang tha mi dad par bzhugs te
T02D1845:244a-16: / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa de rnams nyid la dmigs so zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1845:244a-17: de bzhin du de dang gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid du bskyed nas cang mi gsung bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1845:244a-18: 'dir yang sku la sogs pa mang po nyid kyang /
T02D1845:244a-19: tshig gcig par byas pa ni 'di rnams kyang phan tshun dbyer med par bya ba'i phyir yin te /
T02D1845:244a-20: lus la sogs pa 'di dag rang rig pa tsam
T02D1845:244a-21: du gnyis su med pa'i ngo bor de bzhin nyid
T02D1845:244a-22: gang yin pa de spros nas gsungs pa ni de
T02D1845:244a-23: nyid nges par byas pa yin no //
T02D1845:244a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid
T02D1845:244a-25: kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs de'i bdag nyid can
T02D1845:244a-26: gang yin pa de nyid ni gsang ba'o //
T02D1845:244a-27: de bas na gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud du gsang
T02D1845:244a-28: ba thams cad ston pa'i rdo rje'i ye shes kyis
T02D1845:244a-29: byin gyis brlabs shing so sor shes pa gang yin
T02D1845:244a-30: pa 'di ni le'u bco brgyad pa ste de rdzogs
T02D1845:244a-32: / dad ldan rnams kyis dran pa'i rgyur ni 'dus pa 'di'i //
T02D1845:244a-33: nyung zad tsam gyi tshig gang yin pa bshad byas pas //
T02D1845:244a-34: bdag gis dge ba zla ba ltar snang gang thob pa //
T02D1845:244a-35: des ni 'gro ba rgyal ba'i lam mchog la gnas shog /
T02D1845:244a-36: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon tha ga na'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o //
T02D1845:244a-37: rgya gar gyi mkhan po a'a ts'arya shraddh'a ka ra warmma dang /
